section.title: Handling issues during excution
section.para: PerfCake tries to overcome as many issues as it can. For a 100% validity of your performance test results, always make sure there are no warning or errors in the log. Such issues can be a problem with message template (the template isused without being parsed), a reporter with smaller reporting period than 500ms (the reporter is skipped) etc. More critical issues are reported with a non-zero exit code. See section Exit codes.
